items.name: Basic Sword
items.description: A simple iron sword. It has seen better days but still serves you well.

items.name: Health Potion
items.description: A red potion that restores 10 health points when consumed. Use it anytime from your inventory.

items.name: Stamina Elixir
items.description: A blue elixir that restores 5 stamina. Perfect for long battles.

items.name: Magic Amulet
items.description: An ancient amulet radiating with mystical energy. It seems important.

items.name: Steel Armor
items.description: Heavy but reliable armor that increases your defense capabilities.

items.name: Mysterious Key
items.description: A ornate key. You wonder what door it might open...

enemies.name: Goblin Raider
enemies.description: A small but vicious goblin wielding a rusty dagger.

enemies.name: Highway Bandit
enemies.description: A dangerous outlaw who preys on travelers.

enemies.name: Young Dragon
enemies.description: Even young, this dragon is a formidable opponent with scales as hard as steel and breath that burns.
enemies.note: This is an extremely difficult battle. Make sure you're well prepared!

pages.title: Your Journey Begins
pages.text:
Welcome, brave adventurer!

This is a comprehensive test of all gamebook features including:
- **Consumable items** (use from inventory)
- **Shop system** (buy items with gold)
- **Combat encounters** (manual battle resolution)
- **Item descriptions** (hover over items)
- **And much more!**

You start with 50 gold coins and a basic sword. Your adventure awaits!

pages.title: Village Square
pages.text:
You stand in the bustling village square. The market is busy with activity.

_Try hovering your mouse over items in your inventory to see their descriptions!_

**Available locations:**
- General Store (buy consumables)
- Armory (buy equipment)
- Forest Path (adventures await)
- Town Hall

pages.title: General Store
pages.text:
The shopkeeper greets you warmly. "Welcome! Looking for supplies?"

**Shop Feature Test:** Items purchased here are removed from stock. The shop remembers your purchases even if you leave and come back!

pages.title: Armory
pages.text: The blacksmith shows you his finest wares. The smell of forge-fire and oil fills the air.

pages.title: Town Hall
pages.text:
The village elder sits behind a large oak desk. "Ah, an adventurer! We have reports of goblins in the forest. Will you help us?"

_This will test the combat system!_

pages.title: Forest Path
pages.text:
You enter the dense forest. Birds chirp overhead, but you sense danger nearby.

**Consumable Item Test:** If you have health potions or stamina elixirs in your inventory, you can use them anytime by clicking on them!

pages.title: Goblin Encounter!
pages.text:
A **Goblin Raider** jumps out from behind a tree, brandishing a rusty dagger!

**Combat System Test:**
When you choose to fight, a dialog will appear showing:
- Enemy stats
- Your current stats
- A place to enter your stats after battle
- Victory or Defeat buttons

Fight the battle manually (with dice, imagination, or another system), then input the results!

pages.title: Victory!
pages.text:
You have defeated the Goblin Raider! Among its belongings, you find **10 gold coins**.

_Your stats have been updated based on what you entered in the combat dialog._

**Note:** You can edit your stats anytime from the sidebar if needed!

pages.title: Defeat...
pages.text:
The goblin overpowers you! You manage to escape but you're badly wounded.

_Remember: You can use consumable items from your inventory to heal!_

pages.title: Deeper in the Forest
pages.text:
You venture deeper into the forest and discover an ancient shrine. A **Magic Amulet** rests on the altar!

_But wait..._ If you already bought it from the shop, you recognize this is a different amulet.

pages.title: Crossroads
pages.text:
The path splits. You can:
- Head to the **Mountain Pass** (dangerous!)
- Visit the **Hidden Merchant** (special shop)
- Return to **Village**

pages.title: Hidden Merchant
pages.text:
You find a mysterious merchant in a hidden grove. His wares are rare and valuable.

"Ah, a true adventurer! I have items you won't find anywhere else."

pages.title: Mountain Pass
pages.text:
The mountain path is treacherous. As you climb, you encounter a **Highway Bandit** blocking your way!

"Your gold or your life, traveler!"

choices.text: Try to pay (don't have enough gold)

pages.title: Bandit Defeated!
pages.text:
You have defeated the Highway Bandit! You find:
- **25 gold coins**
- A **Mysterious Key**

Your reputation as a hero grows!

pages.title: Robbed!
pages.text:
The bandit takes your gold and lets you go.

_You lost 20 gold coins!_

pages.title: Mountain Summit
pages.text:
You reach the mountain summit and find an ancient temple entrance.

There's a keyhole in the door...

pages.title: Locked Door
pages.text: The door won't budge without the key. You'll need to find it elsewhere.

pages.title: Dragon's Lair
pages.text:
You discover a cave... and inside, a **Young Dragon** guards a massive treasure hoard!

This will be your greatest challenge yet.

pages.title: Temple Treasure
pages.text:
You unlock the temple and find incredible treasures!

**Congratulations!** You've successfully tested:
✓ Shop system
✓ Combat system
✓ Consumable items
✓ Item descriptions
✓ Currency management
✓ Multiple paths

This is a **soft ending** - you can restart to try other paths!

pages.title: Dragon Slayer!
pages.text:
**INCREDIBLE!** You have defeated the Young Dragon!

The treasure hoard is yours:
- **100 gold coins**
- Priceless artifacts
- The title of **DRAGON SLAYER**

Songs will be sung of your legendary victory for generations!

**LEGENDARY ENDING ACHIEVED!**

You've tested ALL features including the hardest combat in the game!

_This is a HARD ending - your adventure is complete!_

pages.title: Brave But Fallen
pages.text:
The dragon proves too powerful. You fought bravely, but this is where your journey ends.

You can restart and try a different path, perhaps gathering more resources first!

_This is a HARD ending._
